document.full_text: a spokesman for representative gabrielle giffords said she planned to return to florida to watch her astronaut husband lead the final launching of the space shuttle endeavour when the flight is rescheduled.
document.title: southwest: arizona: rep. giffords will return for launching
lines_and_colors: a spokesman for representative gabrielle giffords said she planned to return to florida to watch her astronaut husband lead the final launching of the space shuttle endeavour when the flight is rescheduled.
